alert.note: Alert for Ottawa; Sandusky (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 2:43PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Ottawa and Sandusky Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 243 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Ida to Perrysburg to near McComb. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fremont, Port Clinton, Bellevue, Clyde, Oak Harbor, Gibsonburg, Genoa, Woodville, Elmore, Green Springs, Ballville, Marblehead, Bettsville, Risingsun, Lindsey, Rocky Ridge, Clay Center, Helena, Burgoon and Stony Prairie. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for northwestern Ohio.
